name: Notice to applicant
text:
§803-36  Notice to applicant.  Before executing the warrant the officer shall give notice to the person who applied for it, that the person may be present and identify the property if found. [PC 1869, c 48, §7; RL 1925, §3964; RL 1935, §5416; RL 1945, §10721; RL 1955, §255-21; HRS §708-36; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; gen ch 1985]
 
Case Notes
 
  Must be given before service.  3 H. 393 (1872).
